name: Ozymandias (Team ALLCAPS, Edisu, Swiggies, DaleTGrant, Jonathan Moallem)
name_original: Ozymandias (Team ALLCAPS, Edisu, Swiggies, DaleTGrant, Jonathan Moallem)
description:
Following a map to ancient ruins in a long-forgotten fantasy land, you do the only reasonable thing and set up a small town right on top. Unknown dangers and treasures await your townsfolk, so the town requires adventurers to protect it and explore the surrounding areas. However, the chaos that the adventuring lifestyle brings can often times cause more problems than it solves. It is up to you, the regional middle manager of the adventurers guild to grow this small hamlet into a bustling city. Will you stand the test of time, or will your works return to dust as many have before?

A turn-based roguelite* city builder, where each day you have a limited pool of wealth to build and upgrade your city. As your city increases, it attracts more adventurers whose needs must be met. The primary player engagement is in choosing what actions to take each turn, as well as making choices on how to resolve random events as they pop up.

*tbd

Note: Game is still in development and is currently a prototype

Feedback form for sprint 2

Current Known Limitations

  • Game has no end state, the goal is to keep threat down but there is no penalty
  • Building costs don't scale with wealth increase
  • Events are fixed and don't continue after a certain number of turns
  • Map size is limited
  • Terrain clearing is one tile at a time, not in bulk
  • Lack of clarification/ explaination of stat UI
  • Buildings stats remain after destroyed
